archimate:Requirement.name: R1.4.4 Communication plan for Swedish, Finnish & Norway legislation acts & Baseline trainings
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Security Awareness trainings
U12 As CISO/Head of Security & Compliance Sweden & Norway, I want Security awareness project to support my project with Cornerstone and communication to avoid duplicate work and save time and effort and focus more on the core tasks.
Has been amended with the Finnish Protective Security act after Lingskog stated that it must not be excluded.
